events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday around 5 PM, requesting to file a claim for the damages sustained on their vehicle.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident after verifying the incident involved the insured vehicle in a collision.
An insurance agent was assigned to this auto accident claim to guide the customer through the claim process and necessary procedures.
The customer was formally notified that their auto accident claim has been acknowledged and is now under active review.
Requested the customer to provide police reports, photographs of the car damage, and a copy of the driving license for proper claim processing.
Customer submitted the required documents including police report and photos showing the extent of the vehicle collision damage.
Internal investigation commenced to verify the circumstances of the auto accident and validate the submitted documentation.
The investigation into the accident details and claim documents has been completed successfully with no discrepancies found.
A settlement offer was proposed based on the damage assessment report and coverage limits within the policy agreement.
The customer provided positive feedback regarding the timely communication and transparency of the settlement offer.
Following customer acceptance, the auto accident claim has been officially approved to move forward with payment issuance.
Insurance payment for the vehicle repairs was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s bank account as per policy terms.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after reimbursement, and the customer was informed about the closure.
All records and communications pertaining to the auto accident claim have been securely archived for future reference.
